description: This file defines a set of tools, agents, and a playground setup for human-in-the-loop interactions, including user input handling, email sending, and fetching external data like Hacker News stories and Wikipedia content.

classes.name: EmailTools
classes.description: A toolkit class providing email-related functionalities, including sending emails and retrieving emails within date ranges.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches top stories from Hacker News and returns them as a JSON string.

methods.name: send_email
methods.description: Sends an email with specified subject, body, and recipient address.
